name: Gourmania HD Lite
description:
Time-management plus hidden object - iPhone cooking smash hit now for iPad!

Do you have the skills to win a cook off among the top chefs at a glamorous resort? Begin your journey at a fast food joint, finding the ingredients for the sandwiches your customers want and the processing their orders before time runs out. Before the big showdown, you’ll save a Sushi Bar, a Pizza Parlor and more from shutting down, making you the most sought after chef in town! Full of seek-and-find and slice-and-dice fun, Gourmania is your ticket to the big leagues!

There's also iPhone version of this game! Check the App Store!

LITE VERSION INCLUDES:
◇ 10 levels (of 60 in the full version)
◇ Two locations (of eight)
◇ Two bonus levels for each location
